nodes.text: Tash Arranda was a human who, along with Zak Arranda, encountered a cult and a mysterious artifact after sneaking off to investigate a cave.

Tash Arranda will appear in one of the stories in the tenth issue of the 2020 Star Wars Adventures comic series by IDW Publishing. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Tash Arranda and her brother Zak were the main characters of the novel series Star Wars: Galaxy of Fear and debuted in its first book, Eaten Alive.
